data.name: WineInstallSettingDescription
data.value: Choose how XIVLauncher will start and manage your WINE installation.

data.name: WineVersionSettingDescription
data.value: If you change WINE releases, you might have to clear your prefix (Troubleshooting tab)

data.name: WineBinarySettingDescription
data.value: Set the path XIVLauncher will use to run applications via WINE. It should be an absolute path to a folder containing wine64 and wineserver binaries.

data.name: DXVKVersionSettingDescription
data.value: Choose which DXVK version to use.

data.name: EnableFeralGameModeSettingDescription
data.value: Enable launching with Feral Interactive's GameMode CPU optimizations.

data.name: EnableFeralGameModeNotFoundValidation
data.value: GameMode was not detected on your system.

data.name: EnableFSyncSettingMinKernelValidation
data.value: Linux kernel 5.16 or higher is required for FSync.

data.name: SetWindows7SettingDescription
data.value: Default for WINE 8.1+ is Windows 10, but this causes issues with some Dalamud plugins. Windows 7 is recommended for now.

data.name: EnableDXVKOverlaySettingDescription
data.value: Configure how much of the DXVK overlay is to be shown.

data.name: WineDebugAdditionalVarSettingDescription
data.value: Configure debug logging for WINE. Useful for troubleshooting.

data.name: CompatibilityToolNotSetup
data.value: Compatibility tool has not been set up yet, please ensure you have started the game at least once.

data.name: OpenWINEExplorer
data.value: Open WINE explorer (run apps in prefix)

data.name: DisableGameoverlayRendererHackDescription
data.value: May fix black screen on launch (Steam Deck) and some stuttering issues after 40+ minutes.

data.name: XModifiersHackDescription
data.value: Fixes some mouse-related issues, some stuttering issues

data.name: FixLibICUUCErrorHackDescription
data.value: Fixes a specific "an internal Dalamud error has occurred." In the terminal you will see this text: "Cannot get symbol u_charsToUChars from libicuuc Error: 127"

data.name: ForceLocaleHackDescription
data.value: Sets LC_ALL and LC_CTYPE to "{0}". This can fix some issues with non-Latin unicode characters in file paths if LANG is not a UTF-8 type

data.name: ForceLocaleHackUTFValidation
data.value: Your locale is "{0}". You probably don't need this hack.

data.name: ForceDontUseSystemDescription
data.value: Unsets the TZ environment variable from system provided

data.name: ClearManagedCompatToolsTroubleshooting
data.value: Clear the managed WINE install and DXVK

data.name: ClearDalamudTroubleshooting
data.value: Clear all the files and folders related to Dalamud. Your settings will not be touched, but all your plugins will be uninstalled, including custom repos.

data.name: GenerateTSPackTroubleshooting
data.value: Generate a troubleshooting pack to upload to the official Discord channel

data.name: PatchPathSettingDescription
data.value: Where patches should be downloaded to.

data.name: MaximumSpeedSettingDescription
data.value: Maximum download speed in bytes per second. Set to 0 for unlimited.

data.name: KeepPatchesSettingDescription
data.value: Keep patches on disk after installing.

data.name: GamePathSettingDescription
data.value: Where the game is or will be installed.

data.name: GamePathSettingInvalidValidationj
data.value: Please select the path containing the folders "game" and "boot", not the folders itself.

data.name: GameConfigurationPathSettingDescription
data.value: Where your user config files will be stored.

data.name: GameConfigurationPathNotSetValidation
data.value: Game Config Path is not set.

data.name: AdditionalGameArgsSettingDescription
data.value: Follows Steam conventions: VAR1=value VAR2=value %command% -arg1 -arg2. Can't pass programs (like gamescope -- %command%). Does not accept flatpak args (--parent-pid=1, etc.)

data.name: GameDPIAwarenessSettingDescription
data.value: Select the game's DPI Awareness. Change this if the game's scaling looks wrong.

data.name: UseXLAuthMacrosSettingDescription
data.value: Check this if you want to use the XIVLauncher authenticator app or macros.

data.name: IgnoreSteamSettingDescription
data.value: Check this if you do not want XIVLauncher to communicate with Steam (Requires Restart).

data.name: UseUIDCacheSettingDescription
data.value: Tries to save your login token for the next start. Can result in launching with expired sessions.

data.name: ResetUIDCacheInfo
data.value: Reset the UID cache; use if you are getting FFXIV error 1012 or 500X.

data.name: DalamudInjectionDelaySettingDescription
data.value: Choose how long to wait after the game has loaded before injecting.

data.name: DalamudManualInjectionEnableSettingDescription
data.value: Use a local build of Dalamud instead of the automatically provided one (For developers only!)

data.name: DalamudLocalInjectionPathSettingDescription
data.value: The path to the local version of Dalamud where Dalamud.Injector.exe is located

data.name: DalamudLocalInjectionPathSettingNoDirValidation
data.value: There is no directory at that path.

data.name: DalamudLocalInjectionPathSettingNoInjValidation
data.value: Dalamud.Injector.exe was not found inside of the provided directory.

data.name: XLElevatedWarning
data.value:
XIVLauncher is running as administrator/root user. This can cause various issues, including but not limited to addons failing to launch and hotkey applications failing to respond.
Please take care to avoid running XIVLauncher with elevated privileges

data.name: RepairOfficialLauncherOpenError
data.value: The game and/or the official launcher are open. XIVLauncher cannot repair the game if this is the case. Please close them and try again.

data.name: ReinstallUIDCacheError
data.value:
You enabled the UID cache in the patcher settings. This setting does not allow you to reinstall FFXIV.
If you want to reinstall FFXIV, please take care to disable it first.

data.name: LoginTermsNotAcceptedError
data.value: Need to accept terms of use

data.name: UpdateCheckFinished
data.value: An update check was executed and any pending updates were installed.

data.name: WaitingForDalamud
data.value: Waiting for Dalamud to be ready...

data.name: PleaseBePatient
data.value: This may take a little while, please be patient.

data.name: AutoLoginDisabledNextStart
data.value: Auto login disabled on next start!

data.name: NoSecretsProviderWarning
data.value: Take care! No secrets provider is installed or configured. Passwords can't be saved.

data.name: TroubleshootingDestructiveActionWarning
data.value: Actions here are potentially destructive, take care.

data.name: CannotGetBootVerError
data.value: XIVLauncher was not able to check the boot version for the select game installation. This can happen if a maintenance is currently in progress or if your connection to the version check server is not available. Please report this error if you are able to login with the official launcher, but not XIVLauncher.

data.name: CannotPatchGameOpenError
data.value: The game and/or the official launcher are open. XIVLauncher cannot patch the game if this is the case. Please close the official launcher and try again.

data.name: NotEnoughSpacePatchesError
PatchInstallerStartFailError
NotEnoughSpaceAllPatchesError
NotEnoughSpaceGameError
CannotVerifyGameFilesError
PatchInstallerGenericError
data.value:
The patch installer ran into an error. Please report this error.
Please try again or use the official launcher.

data.name: RepairAllFilesValid
data.value: All game files seem to be valid.

data.name: RepairFixedSingularFile
data.value: XIVLauncher has successfully repaired 1 game file.

data.name: RepairFixedPluralFiles
data.value: XIVLauncher has successfully repaired {0} game files.

data.name: RepairSingleFileMoved
data.value: Additionally, 1 file that did not come with the original game installation has been moved to {0}. If you were using ReShade, you will have to reinstall it.

data.name: RepairPluralFilesMoved
data.value: Additionally, {0} files that did not come with the original game installation have been moved to {1}. If you were using ReShade, you will have to reinstall it.

data.name: RepairGameVerUnsupportedError
data.value: The version of the game you are on cannot be repaired by XIVLauncher yet, as reference information is not yet available. Please try again later.

data.name: RepairFailureError
data.value: An error occurred while repairing the game files. You may have to reinstall the game.
